name: memoryblox
description: Browser-based MEMORYBLOX remake built with TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.

scripts.validate: markdownlint . && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.dev: concurrently -n TypeScript,WebServer,Leaderboard -c blue,green,magenta "tsc --watch" "npm run serve:dev-root" "npm run leaderboard:server"
scripts.serve: concurrently -k -n WebServer,Leaderboard -c green,magenta "npm run serve:dev-root" "npm run leaderboard:server"
